contextId.information: If your language does not allow quotations within quotations you may translate this as a single quote. AT: "Tell others that Jesus' disciples came ... while you were sleeping"  (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_quotations]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_quotations]])
